title: Michigan Supreme Court Takes Up Defense Attorney Case (Audio)
itunes:title: Michigan Supreme Court Takes Up Defense Attorney Case (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Michael Mittlestat, deputy director of the Michigan State Appellate Defender Office, discusses a case headed to the state Supreme Court, which debates the necessity of defense counsel. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
